languages.text: {n}Было бы славно вновь раствориться в блаженном беспамятстве и забыть о своих злоключениях. Но реальность беспощадна — ваше тело уже осознало, в каком незавидном состоянии оно находится, и из последних сил сигналит вам, посылая яркие вспышки боли во все конечности, мышцы и органы. Если вы не встанете сейчас, то, вероятно, не встанете никогда.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Было бы славно вновь раствориться в блаженном беспамятстве и забыть о своих злоключениях. Но реальность беспощадна — ваше тело уже осознало в каком незавидном состоянии оно находится, и из последних сил сигналит вам, посылая яркие вспышки боли во все конечности, мышцы и органы. Если вы не встанете сейчас, то, вероятно, не встанете никогда.{/n}

languages.text: {n}It would be nice to fade back into blissful oblivion and forget your misfortunes, but reality is merciless — your body has already realised the unenviable position it is in and is signalling you with the last of its strength, sending bright flashes of pain into your limbs, muscles, and organs. If you do not get up right now, you probably never will.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Было бы славно вновь раствориться в блаженном беспамятстве и забыть о своих злоключениях. Но реальность беспощадна — ваше тело уже осознало, в каком незавидном состоянии оно находится, и из последних сил сигналит вам, посылая яркие вспышки боли во все конечности, мышцы и органы. Если вы не встанете сейчас, то, вероятно, не встанете никогда.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}It would be nice to fade back into blissful oblivion and forget your misfortunes, but the reality is merciless — your body has already realized what unenviable position it is in and is signalling you with the last of its strength, sending the bright flashes of pain into your limbs, muscles and organs. If you do not get up right now, you probably never will.{/n}

{n}It would be nice to fade back into blissful oblivion and forget your misfortunes, but the reality is merciless — your body has already realized what unenviable position it is in and is signalling you with the last of its strength, sending the bright flashes of pain into your limbs, muscles and organs. If you do not get up right now, you probably never will.{/n}

If you do not get up right now, you probably never will.{/n}

If you do not get up right now, you probably never will.{/n}

{n}It would be nice to fade back into blissful oblivion and forget your misfortunes, but reality is merciless — your body has already realised the unenviable position it is in and is signalling you with the last of its strength, sending bright flashes of pain into your limbs, muscles, and organs. If you do not get up right now, you probably never will.{/n}

languages.text: {n}若是能再次回到那幸福的湮灭之中，忘记目前的所有痛苦，那真的很不错。但现实却是无情的，你的身体已经意识到了它目前所处的危机，正在拼尽最后的力量，向你发出信号。你的四肢、肌肉与器官传来了阵阵剧痛，如果你现在还不赶紧站起来的话，恐怕就再也没机会站起来了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It would be nice to fade back into blissful oblivion and forget your misfortunes, but reality is merciless — your body has already realised the unenviable position it is in and is signalling you with the last of its strength, sending bright flashes of pain into your limbs, muscles, and organs. If you do not get up right now, you probably never will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}若是能再次回到那幸福的湮灭之中，忘记目前的所有痛苦，那真的很不错。但现实却是无情的，你的身体已经意识到了它目前所处的危机，正在拼尽最后的力量，向你发出信号。你的四肢、肌肉与器官传来了阵阵剧痛，如果你现在还不赶紧站起来的话，恐怕就再也没机会站起来了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}至福の忘却の中に戻って不幸を忘れられればいいが、現実は無慈悲だ――身体が不自然な体勢に置かれていることに気づき、全身が最後の力をふり絞って四肢、筋肉、内臓に痛みを伝えている。今起き上がらなければ、このまま死ぬだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It would be nice to fade back into blissful oblivion and forget your misfortunes, but reality is merciless — your body has already realised the unenviable position it is in and is signalling you with the last of its strength, sending bright flashes of pain into your limbs, muscles, and organs. If you do not get up right now, you probably never will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}至福の忘却の中に戻って不幸を忘れられればいいが、現実は無慈悲だ――身体が不自然な体勢に置かれていることに気づき、全身が最後の力をふり絞って四肢、筋肉、内臓に痛みを伝えている。今起き上がらなければ、このまま死ぬだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Te gustaría volver a sumirte en el plácido olvido y perder la noción de tu sufrimiento, pero la realidad no tiene piedad: tu cuerpo ya ha comprendido la terrible situación en la que se encuentra y te envía señales claras con sus últimas fuerzas, con punzadas de dolor por tus extremidades, músculos y órganos. Si no te levantas ahora, lo más probable es que nunca lo hagas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It would be nice to fade back into blissful oblivion and forget your misfortunes, but reality is merciless — your body has already realised the unenviable position it is in and is signalling you with the last of its strength, sending bright flashes of pain into your limbs, muscles, and organs. If you do not get up right now, you probably never will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Te gustaría volver a sumirte en el plácido olvido y perder la noción de tu sufrimiento, pero la realidad no tiene piedad: tu cuerpo ya ha comprendido la terrible situación en la que se encuentra y te envía señales claras con sus últimas fuerzas, con punzadas de dolor por tus extremidades, músculos y órganos. Si no te levantas ahora, lo más probable es que nunca lo hagas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Rien ne serait plus agréable que de vous laisser de nouveau glisser dans le néant, mais la réalité est cruelle. Votre corps est déjà parfaitement conscient de sa situation peu enviable et vous le fait savoir de la pire manière possible : en envoyant des pics de douleur dans vos membres, vos muscles et vos organes. Si vous ne vous levez pas maintenant, vous n'y arriverez probablement plus jamais.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It would be nice to fade back into blissful oblivion and forget your misfortunes, but reality is merciless — your body has already realised the unenviable position it is in and is signalling you with the last of its strength, sending bright flashes of pain into your limbs, muscles, and organs. If you do not get up right now, you probably never will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Rien ne serait plus agréable que de vous laisser de nouveau glisser dans le néant, mais la réalité est cruelle. Votre corps est déjà parfaitement conscient de sa situation peu enviable et vous le fait savoir de la pire manière possible : en envoyant des pics de douleur dans vos membres, vos muscles et vos organes. Si vous ne vous levez pas maintenant, vous n'y arriverez probablement plus jamais.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es wäre angenehm, in friedliches Vergessen zurückzugleiten und dein Unglück zu verdrängen, aber die Realität ist gnadenlos – dein Körper hat seine wenig beneidenswerte Position bereits erkannt und gibt dir mit letzter Kraft Signale durch plötzliche Schmerzen in Gliedmaßen, Muskeln und Organen. Wenn du nicht sofort aufstehst, schaffst du es wahrscheinlich nie mehr.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It would be nice to fade back into blissful oblivion and forget your misfortunes, but reality is merciless — your body has already realised the unenviable position it is in and is signalling you with the last of its strength, sending bright flashes of pain into your limbs, muscles, and organs. If you do not get up right now, you probably never will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es wäre angenehm, in friedliches Vergessen zurückzugleiten und dein Unglück zu verdrängen, aber die Realität ist gnadenlos – dein Körper hat seine wenig beneidenswerte Position bereits erkannt und gibt dir mit letzter Kraft Signale durch plötzliche Schmerzen in Gliedmaßen, Muskeln und Organen. Wenn du nicht sofort aufstehst, schaffst du es wahrscheinlich nie mehr.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hiçliğin verdiği huzura bir kez daha kavuşmak ve başına gelen talihsizlikleri unutmak güzel olurdu. Gelgelelim gerçekliğin acıması yok. Bedenin, durduğu nahoş pozisyonun farkına varıp içinde kalan son güçle sana işaret yolluyor; uzuvlarına, kaslarına ve organlarına yoğun acı dalgaları gönderiyor. Eğer şu an kalkmazsan muhtemelen asla kalkamayacaksın.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}It would be nice to fade back into blissful oblivion and forget your misfortunes, but reality is merciless — your body has already realised the unenviable position it is in and is signalling you with the last of its strength, sending bright flashes of pain into your limbs, muscles, and organs. If you do not get up right now, you probably never will.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hiçliğin verdiği huzura bir kez daha kavuşmak ve başına gelen talihsizlikleri unutmak güzel olurdu ancak gerçekliğin acıması yok. Bedenin, durduğu nahoş pozisyonun farkına vardı ve içinde kalan son güçle sana işaret yolluyor; uzuvlarına, kaslarına ve organlarına yoğun acı dalgaları gönderiyor. Eğer şu an kalkmazsan, muhtemelen asla kalkamayacaksın.{/n}
